name: Kingwood Resort Mukah
features: Kingwood Resort Mukah is a 3-star resort situated approximately 15 minutes from Mukah town, spanning 17 acres and facing the South China Sea. The resort offers 99 guest rooms and suites, each with a private balcony providing panoramic views of the sea and countryside. Facilities include an all-day halal restaurant serving local, Chinese, and Western cuisine, a grand ballroom accommodating up to 1,000 guests, three function rooms for 80 to 100 persons, an outdoor swimming pool, tennis courts, a sea view terrace for barbecues and parties, and 200 car parking bays. The resort is designed to provide a serene environment for relaxation as well as facilities for corporate and government meetings.
address: Lot 96, Block 17, Mukah Land District, 96400 Mukah, Sarawak, Malaysia

name: Kingwood Urban Hotel Mukah
features: Kingwood Urban Hotel Mukah offers a modern and sophisticated stay experience. The hotel provides Premier Single, Premier Twin, and Premier Suite rooms, each equipped with complimentary daily newspapers, tea and coffee making facilities, and Wi-Fi access for all mobile devices. The hotel is designed to cater to the needs of new-age travelers seeking a place to relax and rejuvenate.
